EmailTemplate.subject: Don't forget - Friday 8th of April is our Stress Management and Revision Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
Thanks for signing up to the Stress Management and Revision workshop! This email is to confirm your place on this workshop and also gives you details of the day and what will be going on.
YOUR PLACE HAS BEEN CONFIRMED!!
Deptford Lounge, 9 Griffin Street, SE8 4RJ
Friday 8th of April from 12:30 - 18:00
Refreshments will be provided but please do ensure you have lunch before arriving!
***Any questions please call Rhiannon on 07876836445***
OVERVIEW
For one day only, we are offering NCS grads the chance to attend a happiness and well-being workshop led by the Museum of Happiness and an interactive revision workshop by people with A-Levels, Bachelor’s degrees, and Master’s degrees, as well as a range of professional qualifications.
It will be full of useful revision tips and techniques, as well as information about your learning style. We guarantee that every person will leave knowing their learning style and feeling more comfortable in managing their exam stress.
You will leave with a tool kit of various tips and techniques to boost your mood and conquer stress from the well-being workshop, as well as having a fun and relaxing day doing things such as mindfulness, yoga, and stress ball making!
